posts.post_content:
I have the following T201's for outright sale that are in really nice condition as described and shown.  Prices include shipping and insurance.  PayPal (Gift Only) or checks / money orders are acceptable.  Please reserve with email.  Cards include:

Huggins / Breshnahan - EXMT - $200
Brown / Hofman - EX+ - $110
Crawford / Cobb - EX+ - $615
Summers / Jennings - EX - $80
